expression.description: Patients that reached the age of two during the measurement period.

4 or more counts of "Medication administered: DTaP vaccine", different dates, occurring >= 42 days and < 2 years after "Patient characteristic: birth date", excluding "Medication allergy: DTaP vaccine";"Diagnosis active: encephalopathy";"Diagnosis active: progressive neurological disorder"

operand.description: The number of unique dates on which the patient had a DTaP vaccine administration or procedure.

source.description: The result of this Distinct will be the unique dates on which the patient had a DTaP vaccine administration or procedure.
The result of this Union will be all dates on which the patient had a DTap vaccine administration or procedure.

operand.description: The result of this ForEach will be a list of Dates on which the patient had a DTaP vaccine administration.
The result of this ForEach will be a list of Dates on which the patient had a DTaP vaccine procedure.

expression.description: 3 or more counts of "Medication administered: Inactivated Polio Vaccine (IPV)", different dates, occurring >= 42 days and < 2 years after "Patient characteristic: birth date", excluding "Medication allergy: Inactivated Polio Vaccine (IPV)";"Medication allergy: Streptomycin";"Medication allergy: Polymyxin";"Medication allergy: Neomycin"
